Author: lordctm
Text: babes , i know you are feeling really bad right now, and your emotions are 100% real and justified. I just want you to remember that tomorrow is a new day, and that it will all turn out okay, as bad as it seems now. Drink a lot of water, try to calm down and see if you can eat the meal. If you can't, that's okay as well. Do you have any safe meals you can eat instead? Parents don't always understand the inner workings of an ED, don't take it personal okay? PM me if you wanna talk â™¡
